sentences.sentence: Apologising % to a girl over a sensitive subject can be very difficult.
sentences.translation: 就敏感的话题向一个女孩道歉是非常困难的。

sentences.sentence: Twice after our meetings he has sent me text messages, apologising for sounding grumpy.
sentences.translation: 我们见过两次面后，他给我发短信，为暴躁的说话方式道歉。

sentences.sentence: I seemed to be endlessly apologising to all these strangers in passing, as I floated in and out of their houses.
sentences.translation: 当我飘进飘出他们的房子，我似乎在不停地向所有这些我经过的陌生人道歉。
